id.description: The unique identifier for the demographic question.

active.description: Specifies if the demographic question is currently active or not.

demographic_question_set_id.description: The ID of the demographic question set this question belongs to.

name.description: The name or title of the demographic question.

translations.description: An array of translations for the demographic question's name in different languages.

language.description: The language code for the translation.

name.description: The translated name of the demographic question in the specified language.

required.description: Indicates if the demographic question is required to be answered.
